top_results.content: Alternative Payment Programs (APPs), administered through CDSS in partnership with contracted agencies, represent a voucher-based approach to childcare subsidies that maximizes parental choice[9][12]. Rather than limiting families to directly-contracted childcare facilities, APPs issue vouchers that families can use at any eligible childcare provider of their choosing, including licensed childcare centers, licensed family childcare homes, or unlicensed relative, friend, or neighbor care[9].
